title: The United Nations : A Christian Western Agenda to rule the World
content: The United Nations was formed by 51 states in 1945 following World War 2 that led to 55 million deaths. UN comprises 193 member states, 45,000 employees and 35 associated organizations. However, this so called ‘peacekeeping’ body has failed miserably in keeping peace around the world. 83 different conflicts around the world proves this and…
